20101230233626.000|20101230233628.000|CC1|REBEL IS GETTING NATIONAL

20101230233629.000|20101230233632.000|CC1|SQUEEZED HIS HEAD INTO THIS HOLE
20101230233632.000|20101230233634.000|CC1|NEAR HIS HOME ABOUT 120 MILES   
20101230233634.000|20101230233636.000|CC1|FROM LOS ANGELES.               
20101230233636.000|20101230233637.000|CC1|SERGEANT JAMES HUFFMAN OF THE
